message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'size' as follows:
type size = int[@@deriving show { with_path = false }]

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'return_values' as follows:
type return_values =
  | No_return_values 
  | Only_types of type' list
  [@ocaml.doc " i.e.  [(int, bool, string)], [int]"]
  | Ident_all_types of (ident * type') list
  [@ocaml.doc " i.e.  [(a int, b string]"]
  | Ident_one_type of (ident list * type') list
  [@ocaml.doc " i.e. [(a, b int, c string)]"][@@ocaml.doc
                                               " Constructors for possible return constructions of a function.\n    Invariant: sizes of all lists are >= 1 "]
[@@deriving show { with_path = false }]
